title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 8 categories on the x axis representing Industry, and Percentage of attack traffic in each Industry on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Gaming where Percentage of attack traffic is 79.0.
Followed by 6.0 in Internet and telecom.
The lowest category is found at Media and entertainment where Percentage of attack traffic is 1.0.
The highest value at Gaming is almost 79.0 times larger than the minimum value of Media and entertainment.
The highest value at Gaming is almost 79.0 times larger than the minimum value of Media and entertainment.
The difference between the max Industry Gaming and min Industry Media and entertainment is 78.0.
